alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 6:48AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with torrential downpours will impact portions of northern Camden, Glynn and east central Brantley Counties through 745 AM EDT... At 648 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brunswick, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Woodbine, Dock Junction, Country Club Estates, Waverly, Sea Island, Jekyll Island and Dover Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn
